trans-unit.source: Provides a default control adapter for rendering mobile controls in XHTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 提供預設的控制項配接器，使用 XHTML 標記來呈現行動控制項。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a base mobile control adapter that renders a control and each of its children in XHTML markup for mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供呈現控制項及其所有子系的行動裝置的 XHTML 標記中的基底行動控制項介面卡。

trans-unit.source: It also provides helper methods and common properties for derived XHTML mobile control adapters.
trans-unit.target: 它也會提供 helper 方法和通用屬性的衍生 XHTML 行動控制項配接器。

trans-unit.source: Control adapters are components that override certain <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class methods and events to allow browser-specific or markup-specific handling.
trans-unit.target: 控制項配接器是可覆寫特定元件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>類別方法和事件，以允許瀏覽器特定或標記特定處理。

trans-unit.source: Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior is encapsulated in the <xref:System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的轉譯行為適應性會封裝在<xref:System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter>類別。

trans-unit.source: If you are considering whether to build your own control adapter, keep in mind that a single adapter can be used to override a number of browser class behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 如果您考慮是否要建立您自己的控制項配接器，請記住，單一配接器可以用來覆寫的瀏覽器類別行為的數字。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, by including the desired adaptability in a class derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> class, you might eliminate the need to use a control adapter.
trans-unit.target: 或者，是藉由從衍生類別中包含所需的適應性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter>類別，您可能不須使用控制項配接器。

trans-unit.source: An adapter for a specific control class applies to all controls that inherit from that class, unless more specialized adapters are present.
trans-unit.target: 配接器特定的控制項類別適用於所有控制項都繼承自該類別，除非更具特製化的介面卡。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlValidatorAdapter> class is used to validate all mobile controls for devices that require or can display XHTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlValidatorAdapter>類別用來驗證所有的行動控制項裝置需要或不可以顯示 XHTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the methods of a control that are specific to the current target.
trans-unit.target: 在處理期間，.NET Framework 會攔截所特有的目前目標的控制方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If a control adapter is associated with the control, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項配接器與控制項相關聯，.NET Framework 會呼叫相關聯的配接器方法。

trans-unit.source: Some properties of a control govern the way it displays across multiple secondary pages for a mobile device.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的某些屬性會控管它顯示到多個次要的頁面，為行動裝置的方式。

trans-unit.source: These page are collectively known as *secondary UI*.
trans-unit.target: 這些頁面統稱為*第二個 UI*。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode%2A> property can be used to define which page will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode%2A>屬性可以用來定義將會顯示哪些頁面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ExitSecondaryUIMode%2A> method can be used to remove any secondary UI settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ExitSecondaryUIMode%2A>方法可用來移除任何次要 UI 設定。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter" /> class, name your adapter for a given control type and markup language in the pattern <paramref name="MarkupControlType" /><see langword="Adapter" /> (for example, <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlTextBoxAdapter" />).
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter" />類別中，您的配接器名稱模式中指定的控制項類型和標記語言<paramref name="MarkupControlType" /> <see langword="Adapter" /> (例如， <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlTextBoxAdapter" />)。

trans-unit.source: Adapters for a control that provides XHTML markup should be implemented in the <see cref="N:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters" /> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 應該在實作配接器的控制項，提供 XHTML 標記<see cref="N:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters" />命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Any specialized adapters should be defined for the specialized control under each of the device nodes in the configuration .browser files.
trans-unit.target: 應定義任何特定配置器特製化的控制項，每個裝置中的節點.browser 組態檔。

trans-unit.source: A properly implemented control should not assume that an adapter is attached, or that the attached adapter implements a specific interface.
trans-unit.target: 確認已連接的介面卡，或附加配接器實作特定介面，不應該假設適當實作的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it should check for these conditions.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它應該檢查這些條件。

trans-unit.source: A number of conditional rendering methods allow for such conditions as secondary UI and for display devices that require line breaks after every block or after every inline control.
trans-unit.target: 針對這類狀況與第二個 UI 和需要換行的每個區塊之後或在每個內嵌控制項的顯示裝置，就會允許條件式呈現方法的數字。

trans-unit.source: Examples of these conditional methods are <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ConditionalSetPendingBreak(System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ConditionalEnterLayout(System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter,System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style)" />.
trans-unit.target: 這些條件式方法的範例包括<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ConditionalSetPendingBreak(System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter)" />和<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ConditionalEnterLayout(System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter,System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style)" />。

trans-unit.source: These methods work for a given device regardless of the control being rendered.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法適用於給定的裝置，不論所呈現的控制項。

trans-unit.source: It is unlikely you would need to override these methods when creating a new control adapter based on this class.
trans-unit.target: 也不太可能，您必須建立新的控制項配接器，根據這個類別時，覆寫這些方法。

trans-unit.source: At a minimum, you would need to override the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.Render" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 最少，您必須覆寫<see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.Render" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Device filtering is required to use a specific adapter for a server control.
trans-unit.target: 裝置篩選，才能使用特定的配接器的伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about device filtering, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff) and [Device Filtering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19).
trans-unit.target: 如需裝置篩選的詳細資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)和[裝置篩選概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19)。

trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source:
If the target device requires breaks on block-level elements such as `
`, the text writer specified by `writer` sets a pending break when starting to render the element, and automatically renders a break (`
`) at the end of the element.
trans-unit.target:
如果目標裝置這類需要在區塊層級項目中斷`
`，所指定的文字寫入器`writer`來呈現項目，在啟動時設定暫止中斷，並自動轉譯中斷 (`
`) 結尾的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the content of the element extends beyond one logical page on the device, the adapter clears the pending break at the end of the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目的內容超出在裝置上的邏輯頁面時，配接器會清除暫止頁面結尾處中斷。

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by the .NET Framework internally.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要是在內部使用.NET framework。

trans-unit.source: The name of the tag you want to clear; the value can be <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 您想要清除的標記名稱，該值可以是 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Clears the given text writer's current end tag if certain conditions are met.
trans-unit.target: 如果符合特定條件，則會清除指定之文字寫入器的目前結束標記。

trans-unit.source: This functionality is required only in the very rare case of a target device where a selected element cannot appear inside a table.
trans-unit.target: 這項功能只需要很少見的目標裝置選取的項目無法在資料表出現的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the `s` parameter is provided, the cached ending tag is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`提供參數，會清除快取的結束標記。

trans-unit.source: This allows the text writer to insert content when the target device does not support `<select>` elements immediately after the end of a table.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓文字寫入器來插入內容，當目標裝置不支援`<select>`資料表結束之後的項目。

trans-unit.source: The text `writer` keeps a <xref:System.Collections.Stack> object of class attribute names, and when the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter> renders a class attribute, it signals the text `writer` to push the attribute value onto the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> object.

trans-unit.source: The top class name is treated as the current class attribute name.
trans-unit.target: 最上層類別名稱會被視為目前的類別屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method removes the current class attribute name from the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> if a physical cascading style sheet is being applied.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.CssLocation%2A> property of the style sheet does not represent a physical file, style settings from the control that are appropriate for the `tagName` will be applied in the opening tag.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> object used to render the server control content on the client's browser.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> 物件，用來在用戶端的瀏覽器上呈現伺服器控制項內容。

trans-unit.source: The argument to pass to the event.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至事件的引數。

trans-unit.source: The text that is to appear in the link.
trans-unit.target: 連結中要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: A character to use as the shortcut key.
trans-unit.target: 用來做為快速鍵的字元。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of a class in the current cascading style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 目前的階層式樣式表中的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Renders a postback event as a link with the specified argument, text, and access key, as well as the specified styles or the specified cascading style sheet class name.
trans-unit.target: 呈現回傳事件做為連結，並使這個連結具有指定引數、文字、便捷鍵，以及指定的樣式或階層式樣式表類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode" /> if the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode" /> setting does not equal <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.NotSecondaryUI" />: otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode" /> 設定的值不等於 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode" />，則為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.NotSecondaryUI" />，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by developers of custom adapters.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要是由自訂配置器的開發人員所使用。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation of <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SaveAdapterState" /> saves the current secondary UI mode in view state.
trans-unit.target: 基底實作<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SaveAdapterState" />儲存目前次要 UI 模式下檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: You can override it to save other specific data from view state, but be sure to obtain the current state from the base class, and then combine it with your control-specific state in order to preserve the secondary UI mode across requests.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫，以儲存檢視狀態中的其他特定資料，但一定要來自基底類別，取得目前的狀態，然後再將其合併與特定控制項的狀態，以維持跨要求的第二個 UI 模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on managing view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何管理檢視狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current secondary UI mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的第二個 UI 模式。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: A number indicating the current secondary UI mode, as determined by the form in which it is contained.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前第二個 UI 模式的數字，是由包含該 UI 的表單所決定。

trans-unit.source: Secondary UI is used by controls that show additional screens of a user interface.
trans-unit.target: 第二個 UI 是由控制項顯示其他的使用者介面畫面。

trans-unit.source: To use secondary UI, a control adapter performs the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用第二個 UI，控制項配接器會執行下列步驟：

trans-unit.source: During a postback event, the control adapter sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 在回傳事件，控制項配接器設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter>基底類別。

trans-unit.source: In rendering, the control checks the secondary UI mode, and renders the appropriate secondary UI.
trans-unit.target: 在轉譯中，會檢查次要 UI 模式中，此控制項，並呈現適當的第二個 UI。

trans-unit.source: In response to user interaction with the secondary UI, the control adapter might change the secondary UI mode to another value, or exit secondary UI mode by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ExitSecondaryUIMode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應使用者與第二個 UI 的互動，控制項配接器可能會將第二個 UI 模式變更為另一個值，或藉由呼叫結束第二個 UI 模式<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ExitSecondaryUIMode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This property is primarily used by developers of custom adapters.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性主要是由自訂配接器的開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see langword="CssLocation" /> attribute, if it exists, from the form in which it is contained.
trans-unit.target: 從包含 <see langword="CssLocation" /> 屬性的表單中取得其值 (如果屬性存在)。
